answerText: The Twilight Zone[10] In the episode "Time Enough at Last," Burgess Meredith plays a man who finally has enough time to read his favorite books after a nuclear war. The episode ends with his character doing this, then lamenting "it's not fair!"
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Georgia Tech and Williams | 11 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: In one episode of this show, Anthony sends Dan to the cornfield after turning him into a jack-in-the- box, prompting his father to say, "Tomorrow's gonna be...a real good day!" For 10 points each: [10] Name this classic sci-fi show. The opening of each episode of this show featured a narration beginning "you are entering another dimension."
